name: IMPACT (itch) (kimza)
description:
my first game Impact. this is an experimental game and it will have more updates in the future.

I'M CURRENTLY WORKING ON PATCH 1.1 AND FIXING BUGS

PATCH:  - having a problem with the main menu on other devices. it will be fixed in patch 1.1 - fixed (not released)

- player can bug the blue cube to be on top and win the game this will be fixed in patch 1.1 - fixed (not released)

- lv 3 the red moving platform can push you down and complete the level, not like other levels this will also be fixed in 1.1 - fixed(not released)

UPDATE SUMMARY VERSION 1.1: the game will be added 14 more levels and 4 more mechanics which are lava, falling blocks, passcodes, and time rewinding plus fixing bugs. this will be updated in 31/1/2022

IF YOU LIKE IT PLEASE DONATE TO HELP ME OUT!!! IT MEANS SO MUCH TO ME! paypal.me/kimzastory
